title: Ratio SR45X Cage + Link Kit for SRAM AXS Road
content:
Ratio has just announced the SR45X Cage and Link Kit to increase the SRAM 33t and 36t AXS road derailleurs range or replace damaged SRAM XPLR cages…

In combination with the SR45X Link, the kit extends the range of 33t and 36t SRAM AXS derailleurs for use in 1x drivetrains with larger 10-44t SRAM XPLR cassettes. This makes the transition from 2×12 to 1×12 with a larger cassette simpler and less expensive.

Additionally, the cage alone can be used as a drop-in replacement for damaged SRAM XPLR derailleurs. The new cage uses a 12t upper and a larger 14t lower jockey wheel, the same sizes as found on our cages for SRAM Eagle derailleurs.

Specs:

  • Machined in the Lakes from 7075 aluminum and acetal thermoplastic
  • Available in black or silver
  • Available with or without SR45X Link
  • 66g weight (75g inc. link)

See more at Ratio.
